TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionsZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone

summary.span: 提供用户界面 (UI)，使用户能够在 和驻留在 区域的其他服务器控件之间建立连接。

span.span: Provides a user interface (UI) that enables users to form connections between and other server controls that reside in zones.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 Web 部件控件集，您可以启用两个服务器控件以形成连接和共享数据，其中一个控件充当提供程序，另一个用作数据的使用者。Using the Web Parts control set, you can enable two server controls to form a connection and share data, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of the data. 这两个控件可以是 控件，也可以是任何其他类型的服务器控件，前提是它们设计用于处理连接并且它们驻留在某个 区域中。The two controls can be controls or any other type of server control, provided that they are designed to handle connections, and that they are residing in a zone. 若要了解有关 Web 部件连接的详细信息，请参阅 和 类概述，以及 [Web 部件连接概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100))。To learn more about Web Parts connections, see the and class overviews, as well as [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100)). 如果存在必要的控件和条件来形成 Web 部件连接，则仍需要实际连接这些控件。Provided that the requisite controls and conditions exist to form a Web Parts connection, it is still necessary to actually connect the controls. 有三种方法可以在服务器控件之间建立连接：在网页中声明连接、在代码中创建连接或向页面添加控件， 以便用户可以按需连接控件。There are three ways to form a connection between server controls: declaring a connection in a Web page, creating a connection in code, or adding a control to the page so that users can connect the controls on demand. 控件将生成一个 UI，该 UI 使用户能够连接或断开页面上满足建立连接所需的条件的任何服务器控件。The control generates a UI that enables users to connect or disconnect any server controls on a page that meet the conditions necessary to form a connection. 这是一个可选的控件，它不是建立连接所必需的，但在希望用户控制哪些服务器控件已连接或已断开连接的情况下非常有用。It is an optional control that is not necessary to form connections, but is useful in the case where you want to give users control over which server controls are connected or disconnected. 控件是继承自基类的 Web 部件工具区域控件之一 。The control is one of the Web Parts tool zone controls that inherit from the base class. 作为工具区域， 控件设计为仅在其网页处于特定显示模式时可见。As a tool zone, the control is designed to be visible only when its Web page is in a certain display mode. 在这种情况下，如果页面 上的控件的 属性值设置为 ") ，则显示模式称为连接模式 (页面处于此模式 。In this case, the display mode is named connect mode (a page is in this mode when the control on the page has its property value set to ). 在用户将页面切换到连接模式后，他们必须单击其中一个服务器控件的谓词菜单上的 "连接" 谓词，然后连接 UI 才会变为可见。After users switch a page into connect mode, they must click a connect verb on the verbs menu of one of the server controls, and then the connection UI becomes visible. 作为 Web 部件区域控件，该 控件是一种 区域 (类型，该类继承自 类) 旨在包含其他控件。As a Web Parts zone control, the control is a type of zone (which inherits from the class) designed to contain other controls. 通常， 区域具有与其他 Web 部件工具区域相同的大多数元素：页眉、正文或内容区域和页脚。In general, a zone has most of the same elements as other Web Parts tool zones: a header, a body or contents area, and a footer. 有关 Web 部件区域的定义以及区域的不同部分的完整讨论，请参阅 类概述。For a complete discussion of what a Web Parts zone is, and the different parts of a zone, see the class overview. > [!IMPORTANT] > 与大多数其他 Web 部件区域不同，请务必注意，区域不 包含与其关联的独特的服务器控件类型。Unlike most other Web Parts zones, it is important to note that a zone does not contain a unique type of server control associated with it. 有关区域及其包含的关联控件的列表，请参阅类概述中的图表 。For a list of zones and the associated controls they contain, see the chart in the class overview. 但 区域不包含 控件。But the zone does not contain controls. 相反，它的作用非常有限，它提供用户界面，使用户能够连接或断开页面上某个区域中存在的服务器控件 。Instead, it serves a very limited purpose of providing a UI for users to connect or disconnect server controls that exist in some zone on the page. 控件中包含的唯一控件 是作为其 UI 的一部分生成的标准 ASP.NET 服务器控件，用于形成连接。The only controls contained in a control are the standard ASP.NET server controls that it generates as part of its UI for forming connections. 在 呈现控件时，它将基于页上可以建立连接的服务器控件生成一个 UI。When the control is rendered, it generates a UI based on the server controls on the page that are capable of forming connections. 控件确定页面上区域中的哪些服务器控件 为提供程序，这些提供程序是使用者，哪些连接点可用，以及服务器控件当前是否已连接或已断开连接，然后相应地生成 UI。The control determines which server controls in the zone on the page are providers, which are consumers, which connection points are available, and whether the server controls are currently connected or disconnected, and then it generates the UI accordingly. 例如，假设有一个 控件可以作为提供程序，一个 控件可以作为使用者，在页上的中声明，它们 当前已断开连接。For example, suppose there is one control capable of being a provider, one control capable of being a consumer, they are declared in a on the page, and they are currently disconnected. 当用户将页面切换到连接模式并单击其中一个控件上的连接谓词时，控件将 生成一个包含链接的 UI，单击该链接时，用户可以在其中选择用于创建连接的选项。When a user switches the page to connect mode and clicks the connect verb on one of the controls, the control generates a UI with a link that, when clicked, displays a form in which users can choose options to create a connection. (如果控件之前已连接，初始视图将改为向用户显示一个按钮以断开控件) 的连接。(If the controls were previously connected, the initial view instead presents users with a button to disconnect the controls). 在用于创建新连接的连接用户界面中，会显示用户是一个提供者，哪些控件是一个使用者。In the connection UI for creating new connections, users are shown which control is a provider, and which control is a consumer. 下拉列表控件将显示在每个服务器控件下，并列出控件的可用 对象。A drop-down list control appears below each server control, listing the available objects for the control. 从相应的下拉列表中，用户必须 为提供程序 (选择一个对象，以确定将与使用者共享哪些接口和数据) ， 每个使用者 (的一个对象确定使用者将使用的) ，并将连接到提供程序。From the respective drop-down lists, users must select one object for the provider (to determine what interface and data will be shared with consumers), and one object for each consumer (to determine what interface and data the consumer will consume) that will be connected to the provider. > [!NOTE] > 在 Web 部件控件集默认实现中，一个提供程序可连接到多个使用者，但使用者只能有一个提供程序。In the Web Parts control set default implementation, one provider can connect to many consumers, but a consumer can have only one provider. 若要使用 控件，可以在网页上的元素中声明它 `
` (但不能使用元素嵌套在另一个 Web 部件区域元素) ， `` 也可以通过编程方式将其添加到页面中。To use the control, you can declare it within the `` element on a Web page (but not nested within another Web Parts zone element), using the `` element, or you can add it to the page programmatically. 如果在页中声明元素，这与其他 Web 部件区域不同，则不能在元素的标记之间声明任何其他类型的服务器控件 `` 。If you declare the element in a page, unlike the other Web Parts zones, you cannot declare any other type of server controls between the tags of the `` element. 您可以在其中声明与自身属性和样式详细信息相关的元素，但它是一个独立的元素，并且不是可以在其中声明其他服务器控件的模板控件。You can declare elements within it that relate to its own properties and style details, but it is a standalone element and is not a template control within which other server controls can be declared. > [!NOTE] > 为了提高可访问性， 控件在元素中呈现 `
` 。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素对用于在控件中建立连接的相关控件集进行分组 ，并简化了可视用户代理的控件之间的选项卡式导航 (例如普通 Web 浏览器) 和面向语音的用户代理 (如屏幕阅读软件) 。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for establishing connections in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). 控件具有用于呈现连接用户界面的许多属性。The control has a number of properties it uses for rendering the connection UI. 一组属性包含几个谓词：仅与连接相对使用--在 UI 中执行操作： 、 和 。One set of properties includes several verbs--used only in relation to connections--that carry out actions in the UI: , , and . 大型属性集（特别是用于连接区域 UI）包含在不同位置显示的文本字符串 (或在某些情况下（例如，在 UI 中) 出现错误时）： 、 、 、、 、 、、 、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、、A large set of properties, used especially for the connections zone UI, consists of text strings displayed at various places (or in certain situations, such as when errors occur) in the UI: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 类还包含许多在其他 Web 部件区域中找到的常见属性： 、 、 、、、 和 。The class also contains a number of common properties found in other Web Parts zones: , , , , , , and . 最后， 属性对于类是唯一的，引用启动连接的控件 (这是用户单击其谓词菜单中的连接谓词的控件，这也是 控件的属性) 中引用的控件 。Finally, the property is unique to the class, referencing the control that initiates the connection (this is the control on which the user clicks the connect verb in its verbs menu, which is also the control referenced in the control's property). 类还具有许多方法，其中所有方法都是从基类继承和重写的，其中的大多数方法来自基本 Web 部件区域类。The class also has a number of methods, all of which are inherited and overridden from base classes, and most of them come from the base Web Parts zone classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅各个方法。For details, see the individual methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在 Web 部件页上使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control on a Web Parts page. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件的网页，演示如何声明 `` 元素，并以声明方式和编程方式设置连接区域上的多个属性。A Web page that hosts all the controls, demonstrates how to declare an `` element, and sets a number of properties on the connections zone declaratively and programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够在网页上切换显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to switch display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 该示例的第二部分是包含接口和自定义控件的源文件。The second part of the example is the source file with the interface and custom controls. 请注意， `ZipCodeWebPart` 控件实现了 `IZipCode` 接口，添加了 `ConnectionProvider` 属性，以便控件可以充当连接的访问接口。Notice that the `ZipCodeWebPart` control implements the `IZipCode` interface, adding a `ConnectionProvider` attribute so that the control can act as a provider for a connection. `WeatherWebPart`控件具有用特性标记的方法 `ConnectionConsumer` ，其中使用 `IZipCode` 接口，因此它可以充当连接中的使用者。The `WeatherWebPart` control has a method marked with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute, where it consumes the `IZipCode` interface, so it can act as a consumer in a connection. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此示例使用动态编译。This example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 该示例代码的第三部分是网页。The third part of the example code is the Web page. 顶部附近是用于 `Register` 连接中的用户控件和自定义控件的指令。Near the top are `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls used in the connection. ``元素在页中声明为以声明方式使用控件的示例 。An `` element is declared in the page as an example of using the control declaratively. 在元素中，将以声明方式设置多个属性。Within the element, a number of properties are set declaratively. "连接" 区域上的其他属性是在页面的部分以编程方式设置的 `

para.span: 如果开发人员要更改其行为或为处理连接而提供的默认 UI，则可以扩展此类。

span.span: The class can be extended, if developers want to change its behavior or the default UI that it provides for working with connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 页中声明元素时，将调用此无参数的构造函数 `` 。This parameterless constructor is called when you declare the `` element in an ASP.NET page. 不需要隐式调用此构造函数，除非你以编程方式将控件添加到页面。You do not need to implicitly call this constructor, except in cases where you are adding the control to the page programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 要以编程方式添加到网页的控件的新实例。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor to create a new instance of a control to add to a Web page programmatically. 该示例只包含用于演示构造函数的网页的代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the constructor; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件并且在其 `Page_Init` 方法中使用 构造函数创建控件的新实例 并将其添加到页中的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls and, in its `Page_Init` method, uses the constructor to create a new instance of the control and add it to the page. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在网页上，在方法中 `Page_Init` ，将 使用构造函数) (创建新控件，并将其添加到页面中。On the Web page, in the `Page_Init` method, a new control is created (using the constructor) and added to the page. 当用户将页面设置为 "连接" 模式并单击其中一个控件上的 "连接" 谓词时 ， 将显示一个控件。When a user sets the page to connect mode and clicks the connect verb on one of the controls, a control appears. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor/CS/connectionZoneCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_ctor/VB/connectionZoneCtorVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 连接 UI 随即出现，并且控件已连接，因为该连接是在页的标记中声明的。The connection UI appears, and the controls are already connected because the connection was declared in the markup of the page.

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象使最终用户能够取消建立连接的过程。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to cancel the process of establishing a connection.

value.span: 一个 ，使最终用户能够取消连接两个控件的过程。

span.span: A that enables end users to cancel the process of connecting two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与控件一起使用的取消谓词 是一个区域级别谓词，该谓词在连接用户界面中显示 (UI) 作为用户为控件选择连接点的视图的一部分。The cancel verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users select connection points for the controls. 当用户单击 "取消" 谓词时，它会取消选择连接点的过程，并将 "连接区域" 视图返回到用户可以单击以建立新连接的超链接。When users click the cancel verb, it cancels the process of selecting connection points, and returns the connections zone view to the hyperlinks that users can click to establish a new connection. 使用 属性可获取对 UI 中相应对象的引用。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的，但在引用谓词后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 可以通过 `` 在元素的标记中声明元素，以声明方式设置取消谓词的属性值 `` 。You can set the property values of the cancel verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置谓词的属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `CancelVerb-Text`) 。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `CancelVerb-Text`). 您还可以通过编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `CancelVerb.Text`) 。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以声明方式和编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个 `` 元素，并在元素中声明一个 `` 元素，并使用属性设置一些属性。The Web page declares an `` element, and within the element, it declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 另外，在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中，代码在控件的取消谓词上设置一些属性 。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the cancel verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 单击 " **结束连接** " 按钮以断开已连接的控件，因为该页上有声明性连接。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 单击 " **为提供者选择要连接的使用者** "，并注意设置各种属性的效果。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果将鼠标指针放在 " **终止** " 按钮上，则会在工具提示中显示自定义说明文本。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Terminate** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip.

summary.span: 关闭由 控件创建的连接用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Closes the connection user interface (UI) created by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在连接 UI 中单击区域级别的关闭谓词时，将调用方法。The method is called when a user clicks the zone-level close verb in the connection UI. 此方法执行后，连接 UI 处于隐藏状态， 属性值为 `null` ，而页面仍处于 connect 显示模式。After the method executes, the connection UI is hidden, the property value is `null`, and the page remains in the connect display mode. 此时，用户可以通过单击控件的谓词菜单上的 "连接" 谓词来选择控件，或将页面切换到其他显示模式。At this point users can either select a control by clicking the connect verb on the control's verbs menu, or switch the page to another display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与控件一起使用的关闭谓词 是显示在连接 UI (页脚) 底部的区域级别谓词。The close verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears at the bottom (the footer) of the connection UI. 当用户单击关闭谓词时，它将取消连接过程并关闭连接用户界面，但会使页面处于连接显示模式。When users click the close verb, it cancels the connection process and closes the connection UI, but leaves the page in connect display mode. 此时，用户可以将页面返回到浏览模式，或单击其他服务器控件上的连接谓词来重新打开连接用户界面。At this point, the user can either return the page to browse mode or click the connect verb on another server control to reopen the connection UI. 关闭谓词应与标头关闭谓词 (有关详细信息，请参阅 属性) 。The close verb should be distinguished from the header close verb (for details, see the property). 这两个谓词都执行关闭连接 UI 的相同操作，但标头关闭谓词显示在 UI 的顶部，默认情况下由超链接表示，而关闭谓词显示在 UI 的底部，并默认由按钮表示。Both verbs perform the identical action of closing the connection UI, but the header close verb appears at the top of the UI and is represented by a hyperlink by default, whereas the close verb appears at the bottom of the UI, and is represented by a button by default. 使用 属性可获取对 UI 中相应对象的引用。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的，但在引用谓词后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 可以通过 `` 在元素的标记中声明元素，以声明的方式设置关闭谓词的属性值 `` 。You can set the property values of the close verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置谓词的属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `CloseVerb-Text`) 。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `CloseVerb-Text`). 您还可以通过编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `CloseVerb.Text`) 。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CloseVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以声明方式和编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个 `` 元素，并在元素中声明一个 `` 元素，并使用属性设置属性。The Web page declares an `` element, and within the element, it declares a `` element and sets a property using attributes. 另外，在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中，代码在控件的关闭谓词上设置属性 。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets a property on the close verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 单击 " **结束连接** " 按钮以断开已连接的控件，因为该页上有声明性连接。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 单击 " **为提供者选择要连接的使用者** "，并注意设置各种属性的效果。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果将鼠标指针放在连接用户界面底部的 " **关闭区域** " 按钮上，则会在工具提示中显示自定义说明文本。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Close Zone** button at the bottom of the connection UI, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip. 请注意，连接区域顶部的标头关闭谓词由超链接表示，而关闭谓词上的属性分配对标头关闭谓词不起作用。Notice that the header close verb at the top of the connections zone is represented by a hyperlink, and your property assignments on the close verb have no effect on the header close verb.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可将自定义值用于连接 UI 中此部分的标题。Use the property to use a custom value for the title of this section of the connection UI. 用户使用现有连接显示连接 UI，并单击 "配置谓词" (默认情况下，这由连接 UI) 中的 " **配置** " 按钮表示，此时将显示 UI 的 "配置连接" 部分。The Configure Connections section of the UI appears when a user has displayed the connection UI with an existing connection, and clicks the configure verb (by default, this is represented by a **Configure** button in the connection UI). 可以通过将字符串分配给网页中标记的属性，以声明方式设置属性值 `configureconnectiontitle` `` 。You can set the property value declaratively, by assigning a string to the `configureconnectiontitle` attribute on the `` tag in a Web page. 也可以通过编程方式将字符串分配给属性。Or you can assign a string to the property programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个 `` 元素，在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中，代码为 属性赋值。The Web page declares an `` element, and in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 由于连接已存在，因此你现在会看到 " **结束连接** " 按钮和一个 " **配置** " 按钮，它表示配置谓词。Because the connection already exists, you now see an **End Connection** button, and a **Configure** button, which represents the configure verb. 如果连接是可配置的 (它不在此代码示例) 中，则将启用 " **配置** " 按钮;可以单击它打开 "配置连接" 部分，标题将是分配给属性的代码的值 。If your connection were configurable (it is not in this code example), the **Configure** button would be enabled; you could click it to open the Configure Connections section, and the title would be the value the code assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果连接已存在并且用户已打开连接用户界面，则配置谓词出现在连接 UI 的 "管理连接" 部分中。The configure verb appears in the Manage Connections section of the connection UI, when a connection already exists and a user has opened the connection UI. 用户界面向用户显示结束连接的 " **结束连接** " 按钮和 " **配置** " 按钮 (该按钮表示配置连接) 配置谓词。The UI presents users with an **End Connection** button to end the connection, and a **Configure** button (which represents the configure verb) to configure the connection. 如果用户单击 " **配置** " 按钮，将显示 UI 的 "配置连接" 部分，使用户能够配置连接。If a user clicks the **Configure** button, the Configure Connections section of the UI appears, enabling users to configure the connection. 此选项用于配置连接 (并因此仅在连接使用转换器时启用 " **配置** " 按钮) ，并且转换器包含一个配置向导控件 () ，使用户能够对其进行配置。This option to configure a connection (and hence the **Configure** button) is enabled only when the connection uses a transformer, and the transformer includes a configuration wizard control () that enables it to be configured by users. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For details, see the class. 使用 属性可获取对 UI 中相应对象的引用。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的，但在引用谓词后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 可以通过 `` 在元素的标记中声明元素，以声明方式设置配置谓词的属性值 `` 。You can set the property values of the configure verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element within the tags of an `` element. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置谓词的属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `ConfigureVerb-Text`) 。The properties of the verb can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ConfigureVerb-Text`). 您还可以通过编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `ConfigureVerb.Text`) 。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ConfigureVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以声明方式和编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个 `` 元素，并在元素中声明一个 `` 元素，并使用属性设置属性。The Web page declares an `` element, and within the element, it declares a `` element and sets a property using attributes. 此外，在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中，代码在控件的配置谓词上设置属性 。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets a property on the configure verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 请注意，有一个 " **结束连接** " 按钮，用于断开已连接的控件和禁用的 " **配置** " 按钮。Notice that there is an **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected, and a disabled **Configure** button. 如果你的代码示例使用了一个包含配置向导的转换器，则会启用 " **配置** " 按钮，用户可以单击该按钮来配置连接。If your code example used a transformer that included a configuration wizard, the **Configure** button would be enabled, and users could click it to configure the connection. 如果将鼠标指针放在连接用户界面中的 " **配置** " 按钮上，则会在工具提示中显示自定义说明文本。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Configure** button in the connection UI, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定连接方案中生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 当用户在提供程序控件上单击连接谓词时， 控件将显示允许用户选择使用者的连接 UI 的一部分。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the control displays a portion of the connection UI that enables users to select a consumer. 如果用户在使用者上单击了连接谓词，则连接 UI 会反向执行，并显示有关连接到提供程序的信息。If the user clicked a connect verb on the consumer, then the connection UI would do the reverse, and display information about connecting to a provider. 该属性中的文本 将显示在下拉列表控件的上方，这些控件包含可以连接提供程序的可用使用者连接点。The text in the property is displayed just above the drop-down list controls that contain the available consumer connection points to which a provider can be connected. 可以通过使用页面中元素的开始标记中的属性以声明方式设置此属性，也可以通过 `ConnectToConsumerInstructionText` `` 编程方式设置属性。You can set this property declaratively, by using the `ConnectToConsumerInstructionText` attribute in the opening tag of the `` element in a page, or you can set the property programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中为该属性分配一个值 。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 单击 " **结束连接** " 按钮以结束连接，然后单击 " **选择提供程序的使用者以连接到** 超链接"。Click the **End Connection** button to end the connection, and then click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink. "使用者连接" UI 随即出现，并且分配给该属性的自定义文本 显示在该区域的上方，该控件使您可以选择使用者上用于连接提供程序的连接点。The consumer connection UI appears, and the custom text assigned to the property appears just above the area with the control that allows you to select a connection point on the consumer for connecting with the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定连接方案中生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 当用户在使用者控件上单击连接谓词，并且不存在连接时，最终会到达一个视图，在该视图中，用户可以选择要与以前选择的使用者连接的访问接口。When users click the connect verb on a consumer control, and no connection exists, they eventually arrive at a view in which they can select a provider to connect with the previously selected consumer. 此视图的标题由 属性提供。The title of this view is supplied by the property. 可以通过使用页面中元素的开始标记中的属性以声明方式设置此属性，也可以通过 `ConnectToProviderTitle` `` 编程方式设置属性。You can set this property declaratively, by using the `ConnectToProviderTitle` attribute in the opening tag of the `` element in a page, or you can set the property programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中为该属性分配一个值 。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码使用者** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 单击 " **结束连接** " 按钮以结束连接，然后单击链接以选择某个提供程序。Click the **End Connection** button to end the connection, and then click the link to select a provider. 在用于选择提供程序的视图中，请注意，部分的标题文本是代码分配给属性的文本 。In the view for selecting a provider, note that the title text of the section is the text that the code assigns to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与控件一起使用的连接谓词 是在连接用户界面中显示的一个区域级别谓词 (UI) 作为用户在两个控件之间完成连接的视图的一部分。The connect verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users finalize a connection between two controls. 在用户可在其中选择连接点的 UI 部分，如果两个控件都可以连接，则在 UI 底部附近启用连接谓词。In the part of the UI where users can select connection points, if two controls are able to connect, the connect verb is enabled near the bottom of the UI. 用户选择连接点后，可以单击 "连接" 谓词来创建连接。After users select a connection point, they can click the connect verb to create the connection. > [!NOTE] > 本主题中讨论的区域级别连接谓词实际上在控件之间建立连接，与控件的谓词菜单上显示的谓词不同 。The zone-level connect verb discussed in this topic actually establishes a connection between controls, and is different from the verb that appears on the verbs menu of a control. 当用户将网页切换为连接显示模式时，如果控件可以形成连接，则 会在其谓词菜单上显示连接谓词。When a user switches a Web page to connect display mode, if a control can form connections, a connect verb appears on its verbs menu. 此 连接谓词仅打开由控件创建的连接用户界面 。This connect verb simply opens the connection UI created by the control. 相反， 本主题中讨论的用于在区域级别操作的谓词实际上会创建一个连接。In contrast, the verb discussed in this topic, which operates at the zone level, actually creates a connection. 使用 属性可获取对 UI 中相应对象的引用。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的，但在引用谓词后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 可以通过在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间声明元素，以声明方式设置连接谓词的属性值 `` 。You can set the property values of the connect verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element between the opening and closing tags of an `` element. 还可以在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置谓词的属性 `` ，方法是在窗体中添加特性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `ConnectVerb-Text`) 。The properties of the verb can also be set declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `ConnectVerb-Text`). 您还可以通过编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `ConnectVerb.Text`) 。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ConnectVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以声明方式和编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在元素标记中声明一个 `` 元素，并使用属性设置一些属性。The Web page declares an `` element and, within the element tags, it declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 另外，在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中，代码在连接谓词上设置控件的某些属性 。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the connect verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 单击 " **结束连接** " 按钮以断开已连接的控件，因为该页上有声明性连接。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page. 单击 " **为提供者选择要连接的使用者** "，并注意设置各种属性的效果。Click the **Select a consumer for the provider to connect with** hyperlink, and notice the effect of setting the various properties. 如果将鼠标指针放在 " **连接控件** " 按钮上，则会在工具提示中显示自定义说明文本。If you position your mouse pointer over the **Connect Controls** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定连接方案中生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 当用户在提供程序控件上单击连接谓词，并且连接已存在时，控件将 显示使用户能够断开连接的视图。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, and a connection already exists, the control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection. 此视图还显示参与连接的任何使用者。The view also shows any consumers participating in the connection. 在使用者列表的正上方是使用者说明文本，默认情况下，这是使用者控件在连接中所执行操作的说明。Just above the list of consumers is the consumers instruction text, which by default is more of a description of what consumer controls do in a connection. 可以 `` 通过添加一个名为的属性 `ConsumersInstructionText` 并为其分配一个值，在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置此属性的值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `ConsumersInstructionText` and assigning it a value. 还可以通过编程方式设置属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 在为现有连接打开的视图中，在 "使用者" 部分中查找分配给该属性的自定义文本 。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the consumers section for the custom text assigned to the property.

summary.span: 创建 控件中包含的所有子控件，以准备回发到服务器或进行呈现。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写基 方法。This method overrides the base method. 它将准备连接所需的所有连接相关对象 (例如，从可用的使用者控件和提供者控件中检索连接点对象) ，并在连接 UI 中创建用户与之交互的各种用户界面 (UI) 控件以建立连接。It prepares all connection-related objects needed for connections (for example, it retrieves the connection point objects from the available consumer and provider controls), and it creates the various user interface (UI) controls that users interact with in the connection UI to establish a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与控件一起使用的断开连接谓词 是一个区域级别谓词，该谓词在连接用户界面中显示 (UI) 作为用户管理两个控件之间的现有连接的视图的一部分。The disconnect verb, as used with a control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users manage an existing connection between two controls. 用户单击 控件的谓词菜单上的 "连接" 谓词并显示连接 UI 后，如果两个控件之间已存在连接，则会在 UI 底部附近激活 "断开连接" 谓词。After users have clicked the connect verb on the verbs menu of a control, and the connection UI appears, if there is already a connection between two controls, the disconnect verb appears activated near the bottom of the UI. 使用 属性可获取对 UI 中相应对象的引用。Use the property to get a reference to the corresponding object in the UI. 尽管属性本身是只读的，但在引用谓词后，可以根据需要更改其属性值。Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed. 可以通过在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间声明元素，以声明方式设置断开连接谓词的属性值 `` 。You can set the property values of the disconnect verb declaratively, by declaring the `` element between the opening and closing tags of an `` element. 还可以在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置谓词的属性 `` ，方法是在窗体中添加特性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `DisconnectVerb-Text`) 。The properties of the verb can also be set declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `DisconnectVerb-Text`). 您还可以通过编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `DisconnectVerb.Text`) 。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `DisconnectVerb.Text`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以声明方式和编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在元素标记中声明一个 `` 元素，并使用属性设置某些属性。The Web page declares an `` element and, within the element tags, declares a `` element and sets some properties using attributes. 另外，在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中，代码在控件的断开连接谓词上设置一些属性 。Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the disconnect verb for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码提供程序** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb. 请注意在断开连接谓词上设置的属性值的影响。Note the effect of the property values that were set on the disconnect verb. 如果将鼠标指针放在 " **结束连接** " 按钮上，则会在工具提示中显示自定义说明文本。If you position your mouse pointer over the **End Connection** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip. 单击 " **结束连接** " 按钮以断开已连接的控件，因为该页上有声明性连接。Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定连接方案中生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 当用户在使用者控件上单击连接谓词时， 控件将显示一个视图，该视图使用户能够与提供程序建立连接。When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, the control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a provider. 在指示用户选择提供者连接点的 UI 部分，在下拉列表控件之前有一些文本，用户可以在其中选择使用者从中获取数据的连接点。In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a provider connection point, there is some text that precedes the drop-down list control in which users can select which connection point the consumer will get its data from. 位于下拉控件之前的文本是属性中的文本 。This text that precedes the drop-down control is the text in the property. 默认情况下，此文本值 **来自**。By default, the text value is **From**. 可以 `` 通过添加一个名为的属性 `GetFromText` 并为其分配一个值，在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置此属性的值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `GetFromText` and assigning it a value. 还可以通过编程方式设置属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中为该属性分配一个值 。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码使用者** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在为现有连接打开的视图中，在 "提供程序" 部分中查找指定提供程序之前的文本。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the text that precedes the named provider. 这是分配给属性的文本 。This is the text assigned to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当显示连接 UI 并且连接已存在时，属性中包含的文本将可见。The text contained in the property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and a connection already exists. 在紧靠在 " (属性" 中包含的标头文本 ) （位于连接 UI 顶部），是说明标题，而在下面是说明文本。Just below the header text (contained in the property), which is found at the top of the connection UI, is the instruction title, and just below that is the instruction text. 说明文本通知用户可以在当前选定的控件上执行哪种类型的操作 (选定控件是用户单击控件的谓词菜单上的 "连接" 谓词的控件) 。The instruction text informs users what type of action can be performed on the currently selected control (the selected control is the one for which the user clicked a connect verb on the control's verbs menu). 默认情况下，说明文本将 **管理当前 Web 部件的连接**。By default, the instruction text is **Manage the connections for the current Web part**. 此属性将重写 类中的基属性 ，以便可以将默认连接区域说明文本分配给属性。This property overrides the base property from the class, so that the default connections zone instruction text can be assigned to the property. 可以 `` 通过添加一个名为的属性 `InstructionText` 并为其分配一个值，在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置此属性的值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `InstructionText` and assigning it a value. 还可以通过编程方式设置属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中为该属性分配一个值 。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码使用者** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在为现有连接打开的视图中，请注意，连接区域顶部附近的说明文本是分配给 代码示例中的属性的值。In the view that opens for the existing connection, note that the instruction text near the top of the connections zone is the value assigned to the property in the code example.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于管理现有连接的连接用户界面 (UI) 中的一般说明的文本，该说明是关于可以对使用者或提供者控件执行的操作的说明。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is used for a general description of the action that can be performed on the consumer or provider control, within the connection user interface (UI) for managing existing connections.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含连接用户界面的说明标题。

span.span: A string that contains the instruction title for the connection UI.

value.span: 默认文本是一个由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的字符串。

span.span: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当显示连接 UI 并且连接已存在时，属性中包含的文本将可见。The text contained in the property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and a connection already exists. 说明标题文本只是包含在 属性) （位于连接 UI 顶部） (的标头文本下方。The instruction title text is just below the header text (contained in the property), which is found at the top of the connection UI. 说明标题是一个常规说明，通知用户可以对参与现有连接的使用者或提供者控件执行哪种类型的操作 。The instruction title is a general description that informs users what type of action can be performed on the consumer or provider control that is participating in an existing connection. 默认情况下，指令标题从 " **管理连接**" 开始，以用户或提供者控件的名称结束，用户通过单击其谓词菜单上的 "连接" 谓词选择该控件。By default, the instruction title begins with **Manage the connections for**, and ends with the name of the consumer or provider control that the user selected by clicking the connect verb on its verbs menu. > [!NOTE] > 为此属性分配自定义值时，请记住，如果用户将选择要在其上管理连接的提供者或使用者控件，则不能知道您的设计时，因此自定义指令标题必须足够通用才能引用使用者或提供者控件。When you assign a custom value to this property, remember that you cannot know at design time whether the user will select a provider or consumer control on which to manage the connection, so the custom instruction title must be general enough to refer to a consumer or a provider control. 相反，属性的默认值以这样一种方式呈现：它动态追加用户选择的任何使用者或提供者控件的名称。In contrast, the default value of the property is rendered in such a way that it dynamically appends the name of whatever consumer or provider control that the user selects. 如果要为模拟此行为的属性提供自定义值，则必须从 类继承，并重写此属性或 方法。If you want to supply a custom value for the property that mimics this behavior, you must inherit from the class, and override this property or the method. 可以 `` 通过添加一个名为的属性 `InstructionTitle` 并为其分配一个值，在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置此属性的值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `InstructionTitle` and assigning it a value. 还可以通过编程方式设置属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中为该属性分配一个值 。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码使用者** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在为现有连接打开的视图中，请注意，连接区域顶部附近的标题文本下方的指令标题是分配给 代码示例中的属性的值。In the view that opens for the existing connection, note that the instruction title just below the header text, near the top of the connections zone, is the value assigned to the property in the code example.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 调用此方法时，它将确定是否之前为控件保存了视图状态，如果是，则将视图状态设置为保存值。When this method is invoked, it determines whether view state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the view state to the saved value. 方法会重写 从类继承的方法 ，以便它可以为控件中使用的多个区域级别谓词添加到基实现和还原状态 。The method overrides the method inherited from the class, so that it can add to the base implementation and restore state for the several zone-level verbs used in the control.

[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码使用者** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在为现有连接打开的视图中，单击 " **结束连接** " 按钮。In the view that opens for the existing connection, click the **End Connection** button. 请注意，无现有连接的说明文本显示在连接 UI 底部附近，位于区域的页脚区域中的 "关闭" 谓词的正上方。Note that the instruction text for no existing connections appears near the bottom of the connection UI, just above the close verb in the zone's footer area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法引发 事件，并为其提供自定义处理程序。This method raises the event and provides a custom handler for it. 网页进入或退出连接显示模式后，此方法将执行控件的唯一几个步骤 。After a Web page enters or exits the connect display mode, this method carries out several steps unique to the control. 此方法会取消任何挂起的连接活动，以确保通过将属性设置为，以确保不会显示连接用户界面 (UI) 的子控件 `false` ，并将连接用户界面设置为在用户继续创建连接的过程中可以显示有关现有连接的信息的模式。The method cancels any connection activity that is pending at this point, ensures that no child controls from the connection user interface (UI) are displayed by setting the property to `false`, and sets the connection UI to a mode in which it can display information about existing connections, if a user proceeds with the process of creating a connection. 若要向方法中提供的处理添加专用处理 ，开发人员可从 类继承并重写此方法。To add specialized handling to the handling provided in the method, developers can inherit from the class and override this method. 作为替代方法，开发人员还可以 通过将 `OnDisplayModeChanged` 特性添加到网页 `` 中的元素并向其分配用于处理事件的自定义方法的值，为控件上的事件提供处理程序。As an alternative, developers can also provide a handler for the event on the control by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `` element in a Web page, and assigning to it the value of a custom method to handle the event. 在此方法中，开发人员可以检查属性的当前值 ，如果是，则 可以对控件执行所需的更改 。In this method, developers can check the current value of the property, and if it is , they can carry out the desired changes to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写 实现以重置 (UI) 的连接用户界面，从而必须重新创建子控件。This method overrides the implementation to reset the connection user interface (UI) for the fact that the child controls will have to be recreated. 这是必需的，因为当所选的控件发生更改时，连接 UI 中的几个选项会更改，具体取决于所选控件是使用者还是提供者、控件 (连接点在下拉列表控件中列出的连接点) 和其他详细信息。This is necessary because, when the selected control changes, several options in the connection UI will change, depending on whether the selected control is a consumer or provider, what connection points the controls has (the connection points are listed in drop-down list controls), and other details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定连接方案中生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 如果用户在使用者控件上单击连接谓词，并且连接已存在，则该 控件将显示允许用户断开连接的视图。When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, and a connection already exists, the control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection. 此视图还显示参与连接的任何提供程序。The view also shows any providers participating in the connection. 在提供程序列表的正上方是提供程序说明文本，默认情况下，这是提供程序控件在连接中所执行的操作的详细说明。Just above the list of providers is the providers instruction text, which by default is more of a description of what provider controls do in a connection. 可以 `` 通过添加一个名为的属性 `ProvidersInstructionText` 并为其分配一个值，在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置此属性的值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `ProvidersInstructionText` and assigning it a value. 还可以通过编程方式设置属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性用于 控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with a control. 此示例仅包含演示属性使用的网页代码;对于运行此示例所需的其他两个代码文件，请参见类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 一个源文件，其中包含邮政编码接口的代码，以及两个控件， 用作连接的提供者和使用者。A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. 从类概述获取此代码 。Obtain this code from the class overview. - 承载所有控件、声明 `` 元素并演示如何以编程方式使用属性的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 网页声明一个元素， `` 并在 `Page_PreRender` 方法中为该属性分配一个值 。The Web page declares an `` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/CS/connectionZoneCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionZone_Overview/VB/connectionZoneVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件切换到 "连接" 模式。Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control. 单击 **邮政编码使用者** 控件上的谓词菜单箭头，然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb. 在为现有连接打开的视图中，在 "提供程序" 部分中查找分配给该属性的自定义文本 。In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the custom text assigned to the property.

summary.span: 当包含 控件的窗体回发到服务器时引发该控件的事件。

span.span: Raises an event for the control when the form that contains it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当包含控件的窗体回发到服务器时，方法将处理可能发生的多个结果 。The method handles the several possible outcomes that can occur when a form containing a control is posted back to the server. 首先，如果属性的值 为 `null` ，则没有要执行的其他与连接相关的操作，因此将取消任何挂起的连接，并且该方法将返回。First, if the value of the property is `null`, there is no further connections-related action to take, so any pending connections are canceled and the method returns. 其次，如果 (UI) 的连接用户界面实际上可见并且用户正在创建连接的过程中，则该方法将处理可能的方案：用户单击了连接谓词、用户单击了断开连接谓词、正在关闭该转换器 UI、正在创建与提供程序的连接，或者正在创建到使用者的连接。Second, if the connection user interface (UI) is actually visible and the user is in the process of creating a connection, the method handles the possible scenarios: the user clicked a connect verb, the user clicked a disconnect verb, the transformer UI is being displayed, the zone is being closed, a connection to a provider is being created, or a connection to a consumer is being created. 在每种情况下， 方法都会使用 `eventArgument` 传递的参数，并 相应地更新控件。In each case, the method takes the `eventArgument` parameter being passed and updates the control accordingly. 最后，如果上述所有情况都不适用，则方法将调用类中的基方法 。Finally, if none of the above cases apply, the method calls the base method in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是 Web 部件控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a Web Parts control's properties. 这些值自动放置在控件的属性中 ，该属性是类的实例 。These values are automatically placed in the control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到控件生命周期的 "保存状态" 阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the control's life cycle. 方法添加到基实现可以保存控件中各种谓词的视图状态 。The method adds to the base implementation the ability to save view state for the various verbs in a control.

summary.span: 获取或设置文本，该文本在连接用户界面 (UI) 中位于指定的使用者（提供者向该使用者发送数据）之前的那部分中显示。

span.span: Gets or sets the text shown in the section of the connection user interface (UI) that precedes the named consumer to which a provider will send data.

value.span: 一个字符串，位于提供者将向其发送数据的指定使用者之前。

span.span: A string that prefaces the named consumer that the provider will send data to.

value.span: 默认文本是一个由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的字符串。

span.span: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在特定连接方案中生效。The property takes effect in a specific connection scenario. 当用户在提供程序控件上单击连接谓词时， 控件将显示一个视图，该视图使用户能够与使用者建立连接。When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a consumer. 在指示用户选择使用者连接点的 UI 部分，在下拉列表控件之前有一些文本，用户可以在此下拉列表控件中选择提供程序将数据发送到的连接点。In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a consumer connection point, there is some text that precedes the drop-down list control in which users can select which connection point the provider will send its data to. 位于下拉控件之前的文本是属性中的文本 。This text that precedes the drop-down control is the text in the property. 默认情况下，文本值为 **。**By default, the text value is **To**. 可以 `` 通过添加一个名为的属性 `SendToText` 并为其分配一个值，在元素的开始标记中以声明方式设置此属性的值。You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `` element, by adding an attribute named `SendToText` and assigning it a value. 还可以通过编程方式设置属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically.

summary.span: 可跟踪 控件的视图状态更改，以便更改可以存储在控件的 对象中。

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so the changes can be stored in the control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用类中的基方法 ，同时对与控件关联的谓词触发视图状态跟踪 。This method calls the base method in the class and also triggers view-state tracking for the verbs associated with a control.

summary.span: 获取当前选择的要连接的 控件。

span.span: Gets the currently selected control to connect to.

value.span: 一个 控件。

span.span: A control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户将网页切换到连接显示模式，并在为连接启用的控件的谓词菜单上单击 "连接" 谓词时 ，将打开 "连接用户界面" (UI) ，并且该控件现在由 属性引用。When a user switches a Web page into connect display mode, and clicks the connect verb on the verbs menu of a control that is enabled for connections, the connection user interface (UI) opens, and the control is now referenced by the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性引用的控件 从当前对象的属性获取其值 。The control referenced by the property gets its value from the property of the current object.
